about: Joined as Sr software developr in May 2021 on contract with Wipro(Bengaluru) as client of HP(USA)
Worked hard to reduce issues and increase productivity.
Conducted new-hire training regularly throughout fiscal year.
Managing complete backend written SpringBoot, Hibernat Mysql along with elastic search.
Created custom auto scaling from AWS's EC2 for background process.
Good knowledge of web design by using html, css, bootstraps, jquery, reactJS.
Designed almost 70% of database and managing it.
Headed the development of a central Account Opening web portal to handle multiple business per day.
Single handed delivered 10+ new optimization for the system.
Integrated Payment Gateway (IDFC bank), to handle payments on a daily basis.
Integrated E signing documents from NSDL for Demate account
Designed innovative and interactive exhibits to showcase newly procured and digitized items.
Designed some rich product pages for USA based vendors for amazon.com
I also developed a tool called SAT (Smart Allocation Tool) for task allocation for my team. It was in pilot stage.
